"Both barrels for you, you bastards!"
As the subtitle of the game says, it's an online multiplayer cooperative survival horror shooter. Despite many people comparing it with Left4Dead for me it's not in the line of this game. You fight off monsters in waves together with other players instead of following a certain path like within Left4Dead or Valves Alien Swarm. The game is quite motivating as you A) Can level your character with several "Perks" granting you damage, health and speed bonuses and B) it's quite satisfying if you manage to fight off a wave with (or without) your teammates on your "bloody last legs".
Selecting a perks also gives you a discount in the shop after each wave for specific weapons and equipment. Each wave is getting harder as the amout of special, heavy hitting enemy increases. After 10 rounds "The Patriarch" will spawn. A really deadly foe with rocket launcher, Minigun, tentacles and a lot of health points. Hard to kill, but extremly rewarding if you do so.
This game is sooooo much gd fun.  Grab a few friends and it's good times.

Offers a much different experience than something you'd expect from something like Left 4 Dead. The perks coupled with difficulty levels give reason to keep playing.

Also, it's more of a personal thing, but I get so much satisfaction from the gib physics in this game.

Definitely worth a buy if you're into fps games with survival and rpg elements.

It's the killin' floor, killin' floor

Without a doubt, possibly, one of the best class-based multiplayer, zombie themed game to grace the Internet.

Horrible UI (in-game voice chat, and lobby set-up to name a few) outdated graphics, and a relatively difficult learning curve at the start, makes for an experience that will leave you frustrated at the best of times, and annoyed all the time.

While it has earned a place in my heart, I certainly wouldn't pass up the opportunity to get a transplant with a healthy, KF free one. Maybe with more veins and less cholesterol chocked arteries, so that I could take up another activite that doesn't involve plaything this game.

Killing floor provides a fresh alternative to modern shooters, by replacing knee-high walls with strategy and tactics and providing some of the most satisfying gorey gunplay yet. It can take a great deal of skill, planning, and most of all teamwork to succeed in this game, making it a fun and challenging experience even after hundreds of hours. The weapons in the game really have a kick to them and are part of what make the game great. It is best played with a few friends, because if you try to play in random online matches you will most likely get shitty players who ruin the game, unless you host your own server and police it. Did I mention the badass sound track?

Подтверждение небезызвестному "минус на минус дает плюс". И в данном случае отрицательных знаков как минимум четыре: тошнотворный визуал, примитивная механика, гадкий саундтрек и унылый сеттинг - все показатели проекта-однодневки. Но получившееся из этих компонентов нечто оказалось не по статусу увлекательным и богатым на разномастные эмоции развлечением. 
Должно быть, одна из самых абсурдных рекомендаций.

Easily recommend this game for co-op (up to 6 players) survival fun (10 waves plus a boss fight 11TH wave).  There are 5 difficulty levels and once you get into Suicidal and Hell On Earth mode(s), the game gets super unforgiving and intense.  Level up 7 different classes and swap between them (in-game as well, between waves).  Many weapons, many maps, many different enemies and a fairly active modding community.  Plus!  Killing Floor tends to have annual events for Christmas (most recently Summer and Halloween) with added achievements and in-game content to unlock and it's ALWAYS going on sale.  Buy it when it's cheap!  You'll have no regrets.

Herpin' and Derpin' all over the Floor.

Killing floor is a great, challenging, insanely paced zombie shooter. In a team of six, instead of four, the pacing of the game makes each contest feel more like a military squad shooter rather than panicky civilians as in the great L4D games. Persistent stats allow you to improve your classes over time and the perks are great. This game has soaked up a lot of great times, and no matter how many times you play a map, the different squad makeups, weapon options, and variety in arrays of zombies which come after you make each adventure different. A great game. You will get used to the grainy cinematic look very quickly.
Juegazo, muy entretenido. Algo repetitivo luego de cierto tiempo, por lo que recomiendo comprarlo en un off, como para no decir "ME GASTE 15 DOLARES Y YA NO LO USO".

KillingFloorは6つの職業に分かれてゾンビを殲滅するゲームです。
それぞれに役割がありMedic=注射器プシュ、サポスペ=扉ジジジ、シャープシューター=頭ピチュン、コマンドー=ガガガ、バーサーカー=頭チョキン、デモリッション=爆発、ファイアバグ=ゴミとそれぞれ役割を持っています。ファイアバグは完全にゴミなので、もし今からプレイする人はやらないでください。ちなみに俺はリアルで無職なので早く就職したいです(切実)。あと彼女募集中。詳しくは俺のアイコンをクリックしてね。

You are part of a 6 man team that is composed of various backgrounds.  For instance, you can be a police constable or homicidal maniac that favors both personal pain and the suffering of others.  The team is dropped into a zone-infested area of clones or "failed" experiments that are produced by the so called "Patriarch,"  a former scientist who has gone mad and has used his own body to merge flesh and metal to formulate a biological weapon of destruction.  Your objective?  With stand 10 waves of genetic freaks and kill the Patriarch on the 11th wave.  This game may not have the best graphics or lighting, but that's what makes it great.  While you may be killing tons of enemies in an alley way, many more can creep up behind you and cut you to death.  The gory and freakish creations add to the horror of this game, putting the player and teammates on edge.  With its vast array of weapons to the hilarious phrases of the playable characters, I give this game an 8.0.

Signing out,

Dante

This is quite honestly one of the best games on steam right now. One small issue. And when I say small issue, I actually mean a completely gamebreaking thing that only started happening in the last couple of weeks. For no discernable reason, no menu comes up. What I mean by that is the menu is still technically there, but I can't read anything. It's like the words are invisible. I can still select things, but this becomes infinitely harder when there is no visual clues as to what I'm about to select. That being said, I still very much enjoy the game. If this were not happening, this would be in my top 5 favorite games of all time.
Buy it !

Настоящий survival-horror на движке Unreal. Как в любой хорошей игре, есть свои плюсы и свои минусы. Из плюсов хочу выделить большое (в сравнении с Left 4 Dead 2) количество разнообразного оружия и приятную систему прокачки навыков. Из минусов: отсутсвие интерактивных объектов на картах, за исключением дверей, т. е. бочки с бензином не взрываются при попадании, огонь от пожаров не жжется, а кучи хлама и ящики не ломаются. К сожалению, с онлайном в игре тоже не все в порядке - плохо налажена система серверов.

Killing Floor is an Horror FPS, The accents are SPOT ON.
Scores: Gameplay: 7/10 The same reload animations but this game does a great job of realistic in it, like the movement is just prefect and that the shots have to be carefully aimed when your moving with ironsights. the music doesnt actually get boring over and over again. this game was somehow prefectly created. also this game doesnt actually put alot of horror in it, think FEAR but without the horror.

Killing Floor выросла из любительской модификации Unreal Tournament 2004. Поэтому говорить о заимствовании идей у Left 4 Dead не приходится – концепцию командного зомби-шутера создатели игры выработали сами. В прошлом году они обратились в студию Tripwire Interactive с предложением включить их творение в качестве мода в шутер Red Orchestra: Ostfront 41-45. Однако руководство компании сочло Killing Floor достаточно перспективным для превращения в самостоятельную игру.

Fun, fun, fun, fun, fun. This game has Aged well, has a THRIVING online community and game play is as smooth and addicting as MSG. It's just a hoot. The Characters are absolutely goofy and a blast, the story is "alright" but it's a shooter we can forgive it. 
There isn't really much to say about this; it's a cult classic. A definate Must play atleast once. The online community and just overall appreciation for this game by it's fans speaks dimensions more then I ever could.

Just got this game and it's pretty intense. The enemies come at you fast, hard, and in your face. It's pure insanity and there's a good amount of strategy to this game. Levels are intense. Maps are well detailed and it's just a non-stop romp through a adrenline-fueled zombie kill fest. What more could you ask for?

Killing floor is an amazing 1st person shooter in which you kill mutants created by Horzine Biotech.
You will fight 10 waves of these mutants before you battle the patriarch, the leader of all the baddies you've been fighting.
Now you earn money for each kill you get more depending on the type of mutant, and at the end of each wave you get a massive bonus for surviving. If not well lets just say your gonna be asking for some cash.
But, if you play your cards right you'll be earning loads of money.

Wer Coop-Shooter und Teamplay mag, sollte sich Killing Floor einmal genauer anschauen. Macht auch nach mehreren hundert Spielstunden immer noch richtig viel Spaß. U.a. auch deshalb gehört dieses Game schon seit langer Zeit zu den am häufigsten gespielten Titeln bei Steam (Top 100).
